Title: Key Events
Content: Roddick opens the first Body Shop in Brighton, England, and a second one in Chichester.
The first franchise of The Body Shop opens.
The Body Shop goes public, selling shares on the stock market.
Roddick establishes an Environmental Projects' Department of The Body Shop; Roddick is named London's Businesswoman of the Year.
The Body Shop is named Company of the Year by the Confederation of British Industries.
The first Body Shop in the United States opens.
